snippet: Jose Tejada, a 17-year veteran of the New York Police Department, was the second officer charged with being part of a crew that stole thousands of dollars in cash and drugs.
abstract: Jose Tejada, 17-year veteran of New York Police Department, is arrested on charges that he was a member of a crew that robbed drug dealers of thousand of dollars in cash and drugs; Tejada is second officer with department charged in more than 100 robberies that began in 2001.
lead_paragraph: Jose Tejada, a 17-year veteran of the New York Police Department, was the second officer charged with being part of a crew that stole thousands of dollars in cash and drugs.

headline.seo: Officer Charged in Robberies of Drug Dealers
headline.main: Officer Charged in Robberies of Drug Dealers
headline.print_headline: Officer Charged in Robberies of Drug Dealers
